citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A resposible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A resposible adult was not available june 5 11am, june 11 1pm, July 10 1pm.
Contact me Jerry West ACI. at 240-461-9185 with a time when someone will normally be available for an
inspection
